channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 18:09 Driven anxiety in Sumy Oblast.Creck on Further Messages.

item.title: 🟡 18:08 Drawing of anxiety in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lapetskaya Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 18:08 Drawing of anxiety in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lapetskaya Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_.
